alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 3:21PM EDT until April 27 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... South central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 221 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Allanton, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Seaside, Bahama Beach, Bennett, Davis Beach, Brannonville and Millville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
